Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel @ a Great Price in a wonderful location.”
Reviews.Author: CrusierCat
Reviews.Content: traveled friends miami super bowl weekend unintentionally cruise waited minute book hotel found availability extremely limited hotels grossly overpriced ambassadors provided clean albeit rustic entire party competitive rate clean spacious charming view beautiful grounds kept hotel employees friendly accommodating highly recommend hotel family friends traveling miami sincerity downside share lack ice machine

HotelInfo.Name: Four Ambassadors Suites Hotel
